ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are grateful to the members of the Kichwa community of Pakayaku, Luzmila Gayas, the Peopleâ€™s Assembly of Pakayaku, and the collaborating ayllus (families), for their cooperation during the field work. M.V. Gil Alvarez (Organic Chemistry Department, University of Extremadura) assisted us with the chemical drawing software.
